subject: Upcomming Lessons for Lexi
body:
Lexi Lesson Plan: Tue Dec 5, 2023 at 07:00 PM

Lexi is going to get the melody to 'Jingle Bells'

She has seemed to enjoy melodies, hopefully it will be enjoyable and engaging for her to learn this one.


If any of this is incorrect, please contact us at:
